text: ʋelei è kɔtui ɠaai la, é zeɠe gizei ma, nu yee nɔpɛ ge la zɔɔni ba, é ʋaa, é kɔlui ta kɔlu ɓɔigi, ta penɛ ɠalai, ta walii, ta zanugi ti galeɠale, é ti ɠɛ ga fufiligi. Masagi, GALAGI nii bɔɔlɔai, naa ʋelela ʋele vaiti dɛɛʋɛ ga ɗe, niiti ti ʋaazu ɠɛɛzu. Ɗa-zegi ɠa ga gaamai kulaai kɛlɛma, poluʋɛ nii gè dɛai ga ɗe, nu maanɛɛʋɛ é la da.»
